Sequence Information.Peptide Name: P45(derived from E2 envelope protein of GB virus C)
Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from E2 envelope protein of GB virus C)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.20718496]HIV-1:inhibition of gp41-induced cell-cell fusion in CEM-174 cells(IC50=141.2 μM);inhibition of HIV(HXB2) infection in TZM-bl Cells(IC50=48.8 μM);inhibition of HIV(BAL) infection in TZM-bl Cells(IC50=505.5 μM);inhibition of HIV(69-7) infection in TZM-bl Cells(IC50=43.7 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: E2 GBV-C domain interferes with the HIV-1 fusion peptide-vesicle interaction, produce a notable decrease the cellular membrane fusion, and interfere with the HIV-1 infectivity in a dose-dependent manner.

Literature.Title: Effect of synthetic peptides belonging to E2 envelope protein of GB virus C on human immunodeficiency virus type 1 infection.
Literature.Author: Herrera E, Tenckhoff S, Gómara MJ, Galatola R, Bleda MJ, Gil C, Ercilla G, Gatell JM, Tillmann HL, Haro I.
